reviews.text:
Delicious food. 
Great coffee. 
Excellent service. 
Amazing vibe. 
I 100% recommend Emmett's Cafe!
Ben, who manages customer service for Emmett's, reached out to me to apologize and explain the circumstances of that particular day. All things said: I do...
This was my second time coming to Emmett's for weekend brunch. The first week, I ordered the avocado toast to go. It was amazing, great flavor, super fresh...
